package.name: sigpack
package.description: SigPack is a C++ signal processing library using the Armadillo library as a base. The API will be familiar for those who has used IT++ and Octave/Matlab. The intention is to keep it small and only implement the fundamental signal processing algorithms. The distrubution of SigPack which includes this package.xml file is used by the CARMAPlatform https://github.com/usdot-fhwa-stol/CARMAPlatform and includes some modifications to improve the build process for that system.
package.author: crolen
